element.name: TbbScrollButton.ScrollInterval
element.descr: Time between scrolling steps in milliseconds. A short value means the text will scroll quickly.

element.name: TbbScrollButton.ScrollAutoString
element.short: String inserted between each text instances
element.descr: String which is added between the end of the text and the begining of the new instance of the text in scrolling mode. Default is '...'

element.name: TSbbcrollButton.ScrollGraph
element.descr: If true, the text moves one pixel each scroll interval, producing a smooth scrolling. If false, the text moves one character each scroll interval, produiing a coarse scrolliing.

element.name: TbbScrollButton.ScrollStep
element.short: Number of pixels or characters moved each scroll interval

element.name: TbbScrollButton.ScrollDirection
element.short: Scrolling from left to right or right to left.

descr.p: True: Pixels scrolling. Scrolling is smoother than character one.
False: Characters scrolling. Can be sued qith fixed size fonts.
